1.3.8.title: Fixed generated profiles not being able to be edited

1.3.7.title: Profile export use Long for manifest

1.3.6.title: Retain export file structure
1.3.6.description: Overrides in exported profiles will keep the file structure.

1.3.5.title: Properly delete old mods
1.3.5.description: Fixed old mods not being deleted after updating.

1.3.4.title: Shows Mod Download Results
1.3.4.description: Install/Update modpacks now shows which mod has failed to be installed during and after the install/update.

1.3.3.title: Added Charset retry
1.3.3.description: This fixes some modpack ZIPs having malformed inputs error.

1.3.2.title: Added User-Agent to requests
1.3.2.description: This should fix the 403 error some users are receiving.

1.3.0.title: Better version control & Adapting to new API
1.3.0.description: You can now install modpacks with a modpack ZIP ID.

1.2.12.title: Fixed null downloadUrl
1.2.12.description: Mod downloader should be more consistent.

1.2.11.title: Fixed 403 Status Error
1.2.11.description: Removed the use of a deprecated API URL.

1.2.10.title: Support for running from another directory
1.2.10.description: This is designed for users who want to put this into their PATH variable. The program will always store configurations at where it is.

1.2.9.title: Profile "update" retains old mods
1.2.9.description: Fixed the profile "update" command removing old mod even when the new mod download fails.

1.2.7.title: Version Controller
1.2.7.description: You can now download a specific version of modpack by passing in the file ID of a modpack's zip.

1.2.6.title: Download Retry, Ask Old Folder Deletion and Throw Suitable Exceptions
1.2.6.description: Project downloads now come with a retry option, which allows the program to retry downloading if it failed. Sometimes an old folder of a modpack exists due to failed installation. The program will now ask if it should delete it. Exceptions thrown are now more specific.

1.2.4.title: Split Update and Repair
1.2.4.description: Modpack update will now not re-download every single mod. If you want to repair an installed modpack, use modpack repair instead.

1.2.2.title: Manifest Finding & Better Profile Generation
1.2.2.description: Profiles will now be generated with the responsible mod loader (but that does not mean it is installed). Some modpack does not hold their information in manifest.json, so we use the API to find the required file.

1.2.1.title: Added acceptParent option
1.2.1.description: acceptParent allows user to install mods supporting only the parent version of a profile. Refer to the README in the repository for more details.
